attributes.action: Reject previous petition calling for a repeat of the EU referandum vote.
attributes.background: The EU referandum carried out on 23 July 2016 was done to set standards that were complied with. Turnout was historic. The result should be final and calls for debate on a repeat vote should be rejected. There should be no 'take backs' or 'second chances' as you find when playing card games or sport
